snippet: World number one Novak Djokovic beat defending champion Andy Murray 6-2 3-6 6-3 in the Madrid Open final on Sunday to capture a record 29th Masters crown....
lead_paragraph: World number one Novak Djokovic beat defending champion Andy Murray 6-2 3-6 6-3 in the Madrid Open final on Sunday to capture a record 29th Masters crown.

headline.print_headline: Masters Record as Djokovic Sinks Murray in Final
headline.main: Masters Record as Djokovic Sinks Murray in Final
